#BlackMagicCraft #Episode116

In this episode I start the main pieces for my snow terrain set, modular snow hills. I approached this in a way focused on simplicity and durability. I completed the build without using snow flocking or texture paste as part of the finish work. This way they would be more durable and less likely to shed and get damaged over time.

PICK UP THE TOOLS & MATERIALS USED IN THE BUILD
